text: Motion
Motion
Clerk
Clerk

I'm sorry to keep you waiting.
May I take your order?
I'll have one special curry, please.
Oh, and another one of the same.

Understood.
Please wait a moment.
Juri, do you like curry?

Hm? I wonder...
I might tend to choose curry when I'm unsure.
I often order it at the dorm too.

Well, it's probably more uncommon to
find people who dislike it.

Hahaha
Yeah, that's true.

Oh, speaking of dorm curry, Producer, is there
anything you want to eat at the next meal gathering?

...
Hmm... If I could eat with everyone---

---If I could eat with everyone, then anything's fine!
But let's discuss!

Haha, understood, understood.
...In that case, let's go with hamburg steak.
Oh! Sounds good!

I like it too.
It's fun to make it together with everyone.

Then... how about hamburger curry?
Isn't that the ultimate combination?

...!
Producer... what a terrifying suggestion...
That's something you just can't resist!
